content: k2tog* repeat to end of round round 3- knit round 4- *knit 5 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 5- knit round 6- *knit 4 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 7- knit round 8- *knit 3 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 9- knit round 10- *knit 2 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 11- knit round 12- *knit 1 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 13- knit round 14- *k2tog* repeat to end of round round 15- *k2tog* until 1 st remains k1 cut a 6 in tail weave end through remaining stitches and pull tight now you ve completed your faded beanie go find a fluffy pompom to stick on top and you re good to go
